text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Is there something I can help you with?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …… My state of affairs? I am kept fairly busy with preparations for an important party.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: If you have no particular need, I will have to excuse myself……
